publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6013♦ Nanette Milne: Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (GCRA) for the support that it gives to patients recovering from a heart attack, cardiac surgery or any other cardiac condition in Grampian; notes that GCRA provides cardiac rehab exercise classes led by instructors in 16 communities across Grampian, and understands that GCRA is now the largest provider of cardiac rehab exercise in the voluntary sector in Scotland and has established successful partnership links with NHS Grampian, Aberdeenshire Council, Aberdeen City Council, Robert Gordon University, Aberdeen Petroleum Club, BP Exel Club in Dyce, Meadows Sports Centre in Ellon and Garioch Sports Centre in Inverurie to provide facilities for exercise care in the community. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-6013 Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (lodged on 22 March 2010) Sandra White*, Murdo Fraser*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Aitken*, Elizabeth Smith*, Brian Adam*
S3M-6013 Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (lodged on 22 March 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Gil Paterson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-6013 Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (lodged on 22 March 2010) Mary Scanlon*

S3M-6013 Nanette Milne: Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (GCRA) for the support that it gives to patients recovering from a heart attack, cardiac surgery or any other cardiac condition in Grampian; notes that GCRA provides cardiac rehab exercise classes led by instructors in 16 communities across Grampian, and understands that GCRA is now the largest provider of cardiac rehab exercise in the voluntary sector in Scotland and has established successful partnership links with NHS Grampian, Aberdeenshire Council, Aberdeen City Council, Robert Gordon University, Aberdeen Petroleum Club, BP Exel Club in Dyce, Meadows Sports Centre in Ellon and Garioch Sports Centre in Inverurie to provide facilities for exercise care in the community. Supported by: Sandra White, Murdo Fraser, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Aitken, Elizabeth Smith, Brian Adam, Jackie Baillie, Gil Paterson, Jackson Carlaw, Margaret Mitchell, Mary Scanlon
S3M-6013 Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (lodged on 22 March 2010) Ted Brocklebank*
S3M-6013# Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (lodged on 22 March 2010) Maureen Watt*

S3M-6013# Nanette Milne: Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Cardiac Rehabilitation Association (GCRA) for the support that it gives to patients recovering from a heart attack, cardiac surgery or any other cardiac condition in Grampian; notes that GCRA provides cardiac rehab exercise classes led by instructors in 16 communities across Grampian, and understands that GCRA is now the largest provider of cardiac rehab exercise in the voluntary sector in Scotland and has established successful partnership links with NHS Grampian, Aberdeenshire Council, Aberdeen City Council, Robert Gordon University, Aberdeen Petroleum Club, BP Exel Club in Dyce, Meadows Sports Centre in Ellon and Garioch Sports Centre in Inverurie to provide facilities for exercise care in the community. Supported by: Sandra White, Murdo Fraser, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Aitken, Elizabeth Smith, Brian Adam, Jackie Baillie, Gil Paterson, Jackson Carlaw, Margaret Mitchell, Mary Scanlon, Ted Brocklebank, Maureen Watt
